stimulusHtml: Scholars conclude from archaeological evidence that the ditch that surrounds the site of Stonehenge was created as
choicesHtml: a later defensive measure to protect the site during a time of intense warfare
one of the first features of the site, which later underwent multiple additional building phases
part of a reconstruction effort, during which the siteâ€™s function changed from religious to secular
